for_sales.sales_text:
Penne has been used mostly in the Lake District, Norfolk Broads, and currently at Walton on the Naze. She has: - a new canopy and backdrop (2023) - an SBS Eurospec trailer (2019) and a new jib in 2020. - a 6 HP Yamaha outboard (2017) with remote fuel tank - new running rigging in 2021. - Anchor and chain new in 2022, and a spinnaker/Iso in 'as new' condition.

2-berth with cushions, and loads of storage space. She is a delight to sail.

boat.full_description: Cornish Crabber 17, navy blue with cream decks.
boat.name: Penne
boat.short_description: Cornish Crabber 17, built 2003 and sails under sail number 109.
